0.0.0.name: wordpress/gra4-social-network
0.0.0.description:
Big social networks put plenty of websites out of commission - anyone can create a group, say, on Facebook, and it's much easier than to build and support whole website. Now we want to get web-masters back into the game, arming them with the same functionality major social networks have. GRA4 Social Network adds to WordPress engine features like chat, friends, activity streams, groups, likes, messaging, forums, events, files, Twitter-connected microblog, market and much,much more.

Video Presentation

  • http://wiki.gra4.com/Main_Page#GRA4_Social_Network_Video_Presentation

Try the Demo

If you're interested in seeing what a default installation of GRA4 Social Network has to offer, see the demo at http://wmexp.com/wordpress/gra4/activity/
Please note: to see the social capabilities
